verses.roman:
madhyāhna kariyā kailā bhikṣā nirvāhaṇa
kṛṣṇādharāmṛta sadā antare smaraṇa

synonyms: madhyāhna kariyā—after finishing His noon duties; kailā bhikṣā nirvāhaṇa—completed His lunch; kṛṣṇa-adhara-amṛta—the nectar from the lips of Kṛṣṇa; sadā—always; antare—within Himself; smaraṇa—remembering.
translation: After finishing His noon duties, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu ate His lunch, but He constantly remembered the remnants of Kṛṣṇa's food.
